result.ga: Bhí an bia thar a bheith blasta
result.orig: Bhí an bia thar a bheith blasta
result.html: Bhí an bia thar a bheith blastaThe food was very tasty.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an bia ṫar a ḃeiṫ blastaThe food was very tasty.

result.eng: The fish here is very tasty.
result.html: Tá an t-iasc anseo an-bhlastaThe fish here is very tasty.
result.ponchtml: Tá an t-iasc anseo an-ḃlastaThe fish here is very tasty.
